message:
⚠️ **Final Confirmation for Migration Execution**

The following operations will be performed:

1. Backup current instructions
   → .copilot-state/backup/copilot-instructions.md.bak-2025-12-03T09-04-26-525Z

2. Execute migration
   → Instructions will be updated

3. Rollback will be available
   → Deadline: 2025-12-10T09:04:26.525Z

**This operation will modify existing files.**
Are you sure you want to proceed?

understood_risks.title: I understand the changes
understood_risks.description: I understand that existing instructions will be updated
